name: Complete Feature Development
description: End-to-end workflow voor het ontwikkelen van een nieuwe feature

steps.name: Feature Analysis & Planning
steps.content:
Analyseer de volgende feature request en maak een implementatieplan:

**Feature Request:**
{feature_description}

**Requirements:**
{requirements}

**Constraints:**
{constraints}

Lever:
1. Gedetailleerde feature analyse
2. Technical approach
3. Implementation timeline
4. Resource requirements
5. Risk assessment
6. Testing strategy

steps.name: Code Implementation
Testing & Documentation

name: Bug Investigation & Resolution
description: Systematische bug hunting en fix workflow

steps.name: Bug Reproduction & Analysis
steps.content:
Reproduceer en analyseer de volgende bug:

**Bug Report:**
{bug_report}

**Environment Details:**
{environment_details}

**Steps to Reproduce:**
{reproduction_steps}

**Expected vs Actual:**
- Expected: {expected_behavior}
- Actual: {actual_behavior}

Uitvoeren:
1. Bug reproductie verificatie
2. Root cause analyse
3. Impact assessment
4. Related components identificatie
5. Fix approach opties
6. Priority en effort schatting

steps.name: Fix Implementation
Testing & Verification

name: Code Refactoring Pipeline
description: Veilige en systematische code refactoring workflow

steps.name: Refactoring Assessment

Testing & Migration

description: Complete API ontwikkeling van design tot deployment
